pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wrapper for Ansible cli.========================Usage=====* `pm-execute [ansible command name] [args]` - calls any ansible cli tool.* `pm-cli-reference [ansible command name,...] [--exclude key]` - output cli keys for command. Default - all. Exclude keys by names (support many). Now support output only 'ansible', 'ansible-playbook' and 'ansible-galaxy'.* `pm-ansible [reference/ansible_command]` - run as module. For output reference use 'reference', or full ansible command.* `pm-ansible [--detail] [--get]` - Output modules reference. Contribution============We use `tox` for tests and deploy. Just run `tox -e py36-coverage,py37-install,flake`for full tests with coverage output.
